channel.title: Help whats wrong
channel.description:
im adding dwarf cannon and this keeps happening when i compile whats wrong???

whats wrong????

item.title: Help whats wrong
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:


is causing the error obviously, because you don't have a data type declared for it (as ruby said)

how can you solve this?

Define a datatype... for example

[code=java]public int cBalls
public booelan cBalls;
public Object cBalls;
public byte cBalls;[/code]

do you see where we're (Ruby and I) getting at?

is causing the error obviously, because you don’t have a data type declared for it (as ruby said)

how can you solve this?

Define a datatype… for example

public int cBalls public booelan cBalls; public Object cBalls; public byte cBalls;

do you see where we’re (Ruby and I) getting at?

Read full topic
